adviseScripts.text: Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Why are gunpowder sparks so beautiful?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Because that's their purpose.
They're not as beautiful as you, Neon.
Really? I think so, too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Having beautiful explosions as your entire purpose... isn't it wonderful?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Are you even listening to me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon educates me about the pyrotechnic reactions occurring from gunpowder.
Master! I'm in trouble!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: They're selling a limited-edition cartridge case in 30 minutes, and I'm broke!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Let me borrow some money!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: No.
Are you sure this isn't just an impulse buy?
*Sigh* I knew you would see right through me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I already blew through my entire paycheck!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Well, now that I think about it, I'm pretty sure I've bought that cartridge case before, anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But then again, it would be nice having two of them...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... No, it's not worth putting myself in debt.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I spend time hearing about Neon's love for bullet casings.
Master, which is better?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: One large-caliber bullet,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: or several small-caliber bullets?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: One large-caliber bullet.
Several small-caliber bullets.
I knew you'd give an answer that breaks the mold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I respect that. That's why you have my eternal loyalty.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Wow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You think so small, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I get subjected to a lecture from Neon about the different bullet calibers.
Firepower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Firepower! Firepower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Firepower! Firepower! Firepower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Get a hold of yourself.
Firepower!
Firepower...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Firepower! Firepower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Firepower! Firepower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I continue shouting "Firepower!"
Why is Rapi so serious all the time?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Doesn't it wear her out?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Being super animated all day long would be just as tiring.
Someone has to take things seriously around here.
That's what you think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: As for me, I always keep on the sunny side of life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Oh... well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Neon about personalities.
Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Anis stole my snack.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: All of this rage boiling up inside me... I've got to let it out somehow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Let's go shoot some guns outside.
Go give Anis a piece of your mind.
What an incredible idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: That'll help me vent for sure!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I can't do that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Before Anis stole my snacks, I stole hers!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I discuss anger management with Neon.
Rapi really laid into me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: She said Anis already makes the dorm plenty messy, so she doesn't need me messing it up any further.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text:
Why does Anis get a pass and not me?
Why?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: From now on, you get to mess up the dorm, too.
... No one should be allowed to mess up the dorm.

Wow! Incredible! Amazing!
I'm gonna really cut loose!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... but if I do that, Rapi will really let me have it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You always know the right thing to say, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I teach Neon how to keep the dorm clean.
Master, something's wrong with the shower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It's not working. I have no idea why.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: How can it do this to me? Doesn't it understand how this makes me feel?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Pull your gun on it.
Open your heart and plead with it.
Hey, that's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text:
My gun is how I express myself!
You're saying I just need to open up more!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: From now on, whenever I'm asking for a favor, I'll pull out my gun for emphasis!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: No.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If I end up getting rejected, that'll only hurt my feelings even more.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What an idiot I am! I'm so pathetic!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I listen to more of Neon's serious concerns about the shower.
Rapi brought some cookies back from the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: She gave them to me and told me to share them with Anis.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But... I don't want to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Sharing is caring.
Let's eat them together. Our little secret.
Anis just snatches them so hard she crushes them in her hands!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It's so undignified!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Not like me. I only touch them with my fingertips!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Hm... once they're in our stomachs, no one will know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It's the perfect crime!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I tell Neon about some famous restaurants in the Ark.
I had a scary dream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: A cartridge casing got jammed and my gun wouldn't fire!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What if that happened in real life? I wouldn't be able to shoot!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: There is something called an emergency reload for situations like that.
Just carry multiple guns.
Right, emergency reload. Very tactical.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I need to find the boss.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But a gun is like a lover.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I can only love one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm no two-timing hussy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I study weapon malfunctions with Neon.
Hey, if you could go 10 years into the future and
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: bring back just one thing, what would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: An ultra-high-tech firearm.
The badge of rank.
Since it's the future, there'd be a smorgasbord of cool things to choose from.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Yet you chose firearms without any hesitation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I knew there was a reason I respect you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I guess you must have a hard time, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I have fun running through other hypotheticals.
Master, what is your goal for this year?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If I like the sound of it, I may set the same goal for myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Upgrade my firepower three times over.
Upgrade my speed three times over.
Hmm, that's the same goal I had as of last year...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But then again, why fix what isn't broken?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You mean three times your current speed?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: That's all well and good, but then we could end up being outgunned by the Rapture's new high-performance weaponry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'll keep focusing on increasing my firepower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I put our heads together and set our goals for the new year.
Have you heard about the ghost story involving the fridge in our dorm?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Once a week, on the third shelf from the bottom of the fridge...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Some truly ghastly food mysteriously appears. People say it's made by dead Nikkes seeking revenge on the living.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure they're not just butchered recipes?
Have you tried any of them?
If you're so confident, you should try some.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I assure you, evil lurks within those foul food fiascos.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Yes... for everyone's safety, of course.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But from now on, I'll never do it again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon shares more Outpost-related ghost stories with me.
Do you think there are elevators that can teleport?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I don't like waiting to go up and down to and from the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You could always spend that time waiting with someone you like.
You could cut the elevator cables.
Good point! Then time would pass more quickly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: All right then, next time I'll stay close to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Let me guess, then let gravity do the rest?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'd plummet to the ground about as quickly as teleporting would get me there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Then I can become a ghost and float my way back up, is that it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I racked our brains trying to come up with ways to save time waiting for the elevator.
I was sitting on the sofa, watching TV in your room.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I had clearly been there first, but then Anis barged in and told me to move!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Don't you think that's unfair?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I would say so.
What are the two of you doing in someone else's room?
Right? Right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I knew you would see things my way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Aw come on, how can you talk like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It's hard hearing that from a fellow firepower aficionado.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: In my spare time, I helped settle the great sofa dispute.
I have a question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Where do you think I can find the fabled blacksmith of legend, who can craft a legendary firearm for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Inside your own heart
This so-called "legendary blacksmith" is simply the fire and brimstone in your heart.
No way, the only thing my heart is filled with is fire and brimstone!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Did my question rub you the wrong way?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Otherwise, why would you give me that kind of answer...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You mean to say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: All that fire and brimstone are the key to creating the legendary firearm?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I can't thank you enough, Master. You always guide me to the right path.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If you'd just said to look inside my own heart and nothing more, I'd have thought you were brushing me off!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I talk about the so-called "legendary blacksmith"
Master, I want to ask you a serious question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What would you be more afraid of: running out of bullets, or food?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Food.
Bullets.
What?! How can you say that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: As a die-hard proponent of all things weaponry, I thought for sure you'd say bullets.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Off in the distance, I can hear the muffled sound of Anis cheering wildly.
Sigh... I made a bet with Anis. I thought you saying bullets was a done deal.... guess I lost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Too right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Off in the distance, I can hear the muffled sound of Anis' frustrated screams.
I made a bet with Anis. I said you would go for bullets, and I was right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Watched Neon and Anis settle their bets.
In your mind, what is the pinnacle of firepower?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: A power that can bring order to chaos.
Such a thing does not exist.
Chaos??
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I think you're hanging around with Guillotine too much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You're starting to sound like a bad young adult novel.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Of course.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Firepower is a mountain. The moment you believe there is a summit, you instantly hamstring yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You're right. For firepower, there is no top of the mountain!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I continue to discuss the limits of firepower, and if such a thing truly exists.
Master! Something terrible has happened!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Emma's taken over the kitchen and started cooking!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Just accept it.
I'll try and lure her outside by telling her I'll taste her food.
But if I do that, may the heavens look over my poor digestive tract...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Please, we can't give up so soon!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But if you do that, you'll be putting your stomach directly in the line of fire!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It's a sacrifice someone has to make.
I will not forget your sacrifice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I go to see Emma in the kitchen.
Out of curiosity,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: if you had to interact with one of the CEOs of the Big Three,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: who would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Mustang.
Ingrid.
That's entertainment!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: The last time I saw you with him, you seemed awfully uncomfortable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps you don't find him so bad after all?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Very wise choice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Our CEO is the best, there's no doubt about that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Preach!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I compare and contrast The Big Three CEOs.
